info.name: SonarCloud Dark - Purple
info.description:
A dark theme for SonarCloud with some purple highlights. Mostly the same as SonarCloud default, with white/fff inverted to black/222. With some text changed to purple from gray/black/white.

Contributions are welcomed!
https://github.com/Obsidian-StudiosInc/SonarCloud-Dark-Purple
info.additionalInfo: This is a very new style, and some hovers and elements have not be addressed yet.
